raw: First-time buyers: how will coronavirus crisis affect our move? .
replaced: First-time buyers: how will coronavirus crisis affect our move? .

raw: Q We are in the process of buying our first house , with our expected moving in date at the end of April 2020 .
replaced: Q our are in the process of buying our first house , with our expected moving in date at the end of April 2020 .

raw: We are wondering whether , in this current coronavirus climate , moving house counts as “ essential travel ” .
replaced: our are wondering whether , in this current coronavirus climate , moving house counts as “ essential travel ” .

raw: Equally , will removal companies and cleaning companies ( which we will require for our end of tenancy clean ) be up and running , and classed as essential services ?
replaced: Equally , will removal companies and cleaning companies ( which our will require for our end of tenancy clean ) be up and running , and classed as essential services ?

raw: Many thanks , and I hope you can answer our query .
replaced: Many thanks , and I hope you can answer our query .

raw: A government guidance published on 26 March 2020 is silent on whether moving house counts as essential travel .
replaced: A government guidance published on 26 March 2020 is silent on whether moving house counts as essential travel .

raw: What it does make clear is that people who have n’t yet exchanged contracts on a property purchase should put off doing so .
replaced: What A government guidance published on 26 March 2020 does make clear is that people who have n’t yet exchanged contracts on a property purchase should put off doing so .

raw: Those , like you , who have exchanged contracts can go ahead if the move is to an unoccupied house .
replaced: Those , like you , who have exchanged contracts can go ahead if the move is to an unoccupied house .

raw: Otherwise you should take steps to delay your completion date to which end the government is “ working with conveyancers to develop a standard legal process for moving completion dates ” .
replaced: Otherwise you should take steps to delay your completion date to which end the government is “ working with conveyancers to develop a standard legal process for moving completion dates ” .

raw: If moving is unavoidable because you ’re not able to agree a delay , you must follow advice on social distancing when moving .
replaced: If moving is unavoidable because you ’re not able to agree a delay , you must this advice on social distancing when moving .

raw: For the staff of removal firms this could be easier said than done .
replaced: For the staff of removal firms this could be easier said than done .

raw: Given the size of most domestic furniture , two people carrying a chest of drawers , for example , are going to be a lot less than two metres apart ; ditto sitting together in the cab of the removal lorry .
replaced: Given the size of most domestic furniture , two people carrying a chest of drawers , for example , are going to be a lot less than two metres apart ; ditto sitting together in the cab of the removal lorry .

raw: Given that you ’re not moving in until the end of April , none of the above may matter because your moving date is well after the end of the three - week lockdown on non - essential movement which is supposed to end on 13 April 2020 .
replaced: Given that your not moving in until the end of April , none of the above may matter because your moving date is well after the end of the three - week lockdown on non - essential movement which is supposed to end on 13 April 2020 .

raw: However , if the government does n’t see the evidence it needs to be able to relax restrictions , the lockdown could be extended – some say for as long as six months .
replaced: However , if the government does n’t see the evidence the government needs to be able to relax restrictions , the three - week lockdown on non - essential movement which is supposed to end on 13 April 2020 could be extended – some say for as long as six months .

raw: If the lockdown does get extended and your removal company cancels your planned removal ( because , say , it does n’t think it is feasible to follow the government ’s social distancing advice ) , there is one slight glimmer of hope .
replaced: If the three - week lockdown on non - essential movement which is supposed to end on 13 April 2020 does get extended and your removal company cancels your planned removal ( because , say , it does n’t think it is feasible to follow the government ’s social distancing advice ) , there is one slight glimmer of hope .

raw: Car rental firms are on the list of businesses that are allowed to stay open so there is , at least , the option to hire a van and do your own removals .
replaced: Car rental firms are on the list of businesses that are allowed to stay open so there is , at least , the option to hire a van and do your own removals .

raw: As far as your end - of - tenancy cleanup goes , although cleaners are not listed as “ essential ” , your cleaning company could still be able to go ahead with the cleanup .
replaced: As far as the cleanup goes , although cleaners are not listed as “ essential ” , your cleaning company could still be able to go ahead with the cleanup .

raw: Work can be carried out in people ’s homes provided the tradesperson concerned is well and has no symptoms of coronavirus .
replaced: Work can be carried out in people ’s homes provided the tradesperson concerned is well and has no symptoms of coronavirus .
